Package emissary.kff

Class ChecksumCalculator

java.lang.Object
emissary.kff.ChecksumCalculator
public class ChecksumCalculator extends Object
ChecksumCalculator is a utility class which computes checksums and message digests.
See Also:
  • java.util.zip.CRC32
  • java.security.MessageDigest

  • Constructor Details

    • ChecksumCalculator

      public ChecksumCalculator() throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor initializes SHA-1 generator and turns on the CRC32 processing as well
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the SHA algorithm isn't available

    • ChecksumCalculator

      public ChecksumCalculator(String alg, boolean useCRC) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor initializes specified algorithm
      Parameters:
      alg - string name of algorightm, e.g. SHA
      useCRC - true if CRC32 should be calculated
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm isn't available

    • ChecksumCalculator

      public ChecksumCalculator(@Nullable String[] algs) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor initializes specified set of algorithms
      Parameters:
      algs - array of String algorithm names, put CRC32 on list to enable
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if an algorithm isn't available

    • ChecksumCalculator

      public ChecksumCalculator(@Nullable Collection<String> algs) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor initializes specified set of algorithms
      Parameters:
      algs - Collection of String algorithm names, put CRC32 on list to enable
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if an algorithm isn't available

    • digest

      public ChecksumResults digest(byte[] buffer)
      Calculates a CRC32 and a digest on a byte array.
      Parameters:
      buffer - Data to compute results for
      Returns:
      results of computing the requested hashes on the data

    • digest

      public ChecksumResults digest(SeekableByteChannelFactory sbcf)
      Calculates a CRC32 and a digest on a SeekableByteChannel of data.
      Parameters:
      sbcf - Provider of data to compute results for
      Returns:
      results of computing the requested hashes on the data
